transArray.content: I brought children here, so I chose the parent-child room, the space is okay, and the children like it very much. The heating is sufficient, and the windows are open for ventilation, so I am generally satisfied. It takes about 18 minutes to walk to Tiananmen Square. There are a lot of food around, which is more convenient. The bathroom is transparent, so it doesn't matter if you travel as a family.
